column4: quick question folks, when i tar, im doing tar cvpf /root/lampp.tar /opt/ --exclude /opt/lampp/logs/ why is it still processing the logs folder and files?
tried placing the  --exclude /opt/lampp/logs  before the pathnames?
try a * at the end of your pattern
hmm, I see the syntax is supposed to be:  --exclude=PATTERN   do you have the  = ?
